scripts.install-all: npm install && cd frontend && npm install && cd ../backend && npm install
scripts.start: concurrently "npm run server --prefix backend" "npm run client --prefix frontend"
scripts.dev: concurrently "npm run dev --prefix backend" "npm run dev --prefix frontend"
scripts.build: npm install --prefix frontend && npm run build --prefix frontend && mkdir -p dist && cp -r frontend/dist/* dist/
